detail_desc: Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, two buttons at the top, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and short slits in the sides.
Bomber jacket in woven fabric with sequined panels on the sleeves. Small, ribbed stand-up collar, a zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Metal earrings in various sizes and designs. Three pairs of hoops with metal pendants and three pairs of earrings decorated with pearly plastic beads. Size from 1.8 cm to 2.5 cm.
High-waisted, ankle-length trousers in stretch jersey with concealed elastication at the waist, a visible zip at the back and slim legs.
Short, fitted top in ribbed cotton jersey with short sleeves.
Top in woven fabric with a V-neck and spaghetti shoulder straps.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Top in washed cotton sweatshirt fabric with a detachable hood, collar and shoulder tabs with a button. Buttons at the top, a yoke at the back, large patch pockets with a flap at the top, welt front pockets, raglan sleeves with a button at the cuffs, and a drawstring at the hem.
Imitation leather belt with an embossed snakeskin pattern and covered metal buckle. Width approx. 2.5 cm.
Trousers in striped organic cotton bonded jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Short dress in woven fabric with embroidered details, a sewn-in wrapover at the front, wide, 3/4-length sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist. Scalloped V-neck, cuffs and hem. Partly lined in jersey.

Knee-length dress in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar, V-shaped opening at the front and yoke at the back. Pleats down the front, a detachable belt with metal D-rings at the waist and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Short, straight-cut dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck, narrow shoulder straps and decorative crossover straps at the back. Lined.
Sleeveless playsuit in viscose jersey with a V-neck front and back and narrow shoulder straps. Elasticated seam at the waist with decorative twisted ties with tassels, and short, wide legs.

LIMITED EDITION. Calf-length skirt in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise, a high waist and concealed zip in one side. Flared, asymmetric skirt that is longer at the sides and has a scalloped hem. Lined.
Triangle bikini top with scalloped trims and gathered, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Ties at the back and back of the neck.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved top in soft slub cotton jersey with an interactive sequin motif on the front and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with elastication and a press-stud at the waist and fake front pockets with zips.
Short, A-line skirt in cotton twill with a zip fly and button, patch front pockets and back pockets.
Glasses with metal and plastic frames and clear lenses.
Off-the-shoulder dress in an airy, jacquard-weave silk blend with elastication at the top and short sleeves. Satin lining.
Set with a hat and gloves in a soft knit. Pattern-knit hat with a pompom on top and a ribbed turn-up at the hem. Fine-knit gloves with wide ribbed cuffs.
Double-layered headband in a soft, chunky knit with a knot detail at the front.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist, ties and plastic rings at the sides and a high cut at the back.
Gloves in a soft, fine knit with ribbed cuffs. The tops of the thumb and index finger are in touchscreen-compatible material.
Cropped, fitted top in cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
Sleeveless dress in a softly draping weave with a collar, concealed buttons down the front, flap chest pockets and a drawstring at the waist.
Strappy top in soft organic cotton jersey with a V-neck with lace embroidery at the front.
Straight-cut sleeveless top in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a round neckline and shoulder pads.

Ballet shoes in satin with a decorative bow at the front, elastic straps that cross over the foot and concealed elastication around the opening. Lining and patterned insoles in a cotton weave. Suede soles.
Trainers with lacing at the front and a wide, partly ribbed rubber trim around the soles. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Shirt in crisp cotton poplin with a grandad collar with detachable ties at the front, a yoke at the back and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Longer at the back.

Dress in an airy jacquard weave made from recycled polyester. Deep V-neck with covered buttons, an asymmetric seam with a grosgrain trim at the waist, and a concealed zip in one side made from recycled polyester. Long trumpet sleeves with decorative seams at the cuffs. Skirt in several flounced tiers with an asymmetric hem. Shorter at the front. Bodice and skirt lined with recycled polyester.
Satin-covered Alice band with a padded, glittery horn and ears with glittery details.
Short top in soft sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch cotton denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and slim legs that finish just above the knees. The cotton content of the shorts is partly recycled.
Long-sleeved tops in lightweight organic cotton jersey.
Shorts in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Long shirt woven in a cotton and linen blend with a collar and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Calf-length dress in a plumeti weave with a V-neck, wrapover top with a safety button and short, wide sleeves. Narrow, elasticated seam and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and medium coverage at the back.
Cigarette trousers in soft viscose jersey with an elasticated waist, side pockets and tapered legs.
Knee-length dress in airy chiffon with a V-neck, smocked seam under the bust, long sleeves and narrow cuffs with a button. Partly lined.
Adjustable elastic braces with metal fasteners and imitation leather details.
Top in smocked cotton jersey with elastication over the shoulders and short, elasticated puff sleeves in a broderie anglaise weave.
Fully lined swimsuit with a V-neck, shoulder straps that cross at the back, a low-cut back and high-cut legs.

Shorts in pima cotton twill with a high waist and zip fly with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners. Side pockets, a welt back pocket and slightly wider legs with pleats at the front and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Tunic in a crêpe weave with a tie-front collar and 3/4-length sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Long-sleeved cardigan in a soft fine knit with a V-neck, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short jersey skirt with concealed elastication at the waist.
Loose-fitting strappy top in an airy satin weave with a V-neck.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with buttons down the front, ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem and a straight hem with short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Straight-cut sports tops in fast-drying functional fabric with a round neck and short dolman sleeves. One top has a print motif on the front.
Cropped top in a soft, fine knit containing some wool. Wide shoulder straps reinforced with grosgrain, and a wide, ribbed hem. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Sturdy mesh sandals with a hook and loop fastening at the top and a loop at the back. Scuba fabric lining. Textured insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.

Set with a bodysuit, pair of shorts and hat in soft, printed organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with lapped shoulders, short sleeves and press-studs at the crotch. Shorts with an elasticated waist. Hat with a sewn-in turn-up.
Long-sleeved top in soft, organic cotton jersey with a chest pocket and a press-stud on one shoulder (sizes 1-4Y without a press-stud).
Shirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Chest pocket, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Cotton jersey T-shirt.
Fully lined bikini bottoms. Mid waist with gathered elastication and a small frill trim, and a high cut at the back.
Sleeveless blouse in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem.
Hairband in woven fabric with a decorative knot at the front and covered elastic at the back.

Short, wide dress in woven fabric with a round neckline, small opening at the back with narrow ties at the back of the neck and a frill trim around the armhole seams. Short puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the hems and a low-cut skirt with gathers to create volume and soft draping.
Blouse in an airy weave with a V-neck and a rounded hem with short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Slim-fit, high-waisted jeans in washed, stretch denim. Adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), button fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Bucket hat in woven fabric. Width of brim approx. 6 cm.

Calf-length dress in a cotton weave with a sewn-in wrapover at the top, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a V-neck with a wide, elasticated flounced trim. Seam below the bust and a seam and wide flounce at the hem. Lined.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and a fake fly.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and ribbed trim around the neckline.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Track jacket in sturdy jersey with a mesh-lined drawstring hood and a zip down the front. Long raglan sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs and mesh-lined side pockets with a taped zip. Unlined.

Short, fitted pencil skirt in woven fabric with a high waist, narrow, detachable belt and a concealed zip at the back. Lined. The polyester content of the outer fabric is partly recycled. The polyester content of the lining is recycled.
Knee-length, off-the-shoulder dress in woven fabric with elastication and decorative embroidery at the top, short sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Fine-knit polo shirt in a soft silk and cotton blend with a collar, button placket, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and slits in the sides of the hem.
Dress in a soft, viscose weave with a V-neck, short cap sleeves and a rounded hem with short slits in the sides.
Jumper in a soft knit with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in an airy cotton weave with embroidery, smocking at the top and long, wide raglan sleeves with buttons at the cuffs.
